name: Garden Defender (Dead Unicorn)
description:
Garden Defender is a tower defense farming simulator game. The goal of the game is to build and defend your garden as long as you can. Plant and harvest crops to earn points, build towers to defend your garden, build scarecrows to tank hits, and mines to produce stones and gold.

Controls
  • WASD - MOVE
  • LEFT & RIGHT ARROW - HOTBAR
  • UP ARROW - CANCEL
  • DOWN ARROW - CONFIRM / USE ITEM
  • W & S - NAVIGATE ITEM SLOTS
  • ESCAPE - PAUSE
Social
